snippet: Boston and Philadelphia will meet in the second round of the N.B.A. playoffs as longtime rivals and as two of the league’s top defensive teams.
abstract: Boston Celtics and the Philadelphia 76ers will meet in the second round of the NBA playoffs as longtime rivals and as two of the league’s top defensive teams; matchup pits Boston's veteran roster against Philadelphia's youth.
lead_paragraph: Boston and Philadelphia will meet in the second round of the N.B.A. playoffs as longtime rivals and as two of the league’s top defensive teams.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Playoffs — Celtics Will Meet an Old Rival in 76ers
headline.main: Veterans Against Youth in Celtics-76ers Matchup
headline.print_headline: In Matchup of Celtics and 76ers, It’s Veterans Versus Youth
